What I did to make the game work perfectly (i've had the errors to):

First download this update (not the one the game wants to download, just abort that one):
http://www.sierra.com/en/home/games/game_info.tab-downloadtab.prod-L2NvbnRlbnQvc2llcnJhL2VuL3Byb2R1Y3RzL2ZfZV9hX3JfX3JlZ3VsYXJfZWRpdGlvbg%3d%3d.platform-pc.html

Then download this crack and put it in the original FEAR folder as replacement of FEAR.exe:
http://www.gameburnworld.com/dl/dl.php?file=F.E.A.R.v1.08NoDVDFixedexeEng.rar

The game is wicked, I hope my help will be usefull so we can all shiver!
